mapper.select: select a.*, b.COM_NAME, b.COM_TEL1, b.COM_TEL2, b.COM_TEL3, b.COM_RETURN_PLACE from ( select comc.*, (to_date(#{searchEndDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi')-to_date(#{searchStartDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi')) * comc.CCAR_NORMAL_PRICE as "PRICERESULT", c.car_name, c.car_inc, c.car_size, c.car_trans, car_type, car_img from COMPANYCAROPTION comc join car c on comc.car_code=c.car_code) a join company b on a.com_id=b.com_id where ccar_car_id=#{ccarCarId}
mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION( reserv_num, user_tel1, user_tel2, user_tel3, reserv_start_date, reserv_end_date, ccar_car_id, reserv_insurance, user_id) values(#{reservNum}, #{userTel1},#{userTel2},#{userTel3}, TO_DATE(#{reservStartDate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), TO_DATE(#{reservEndDate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), #{ccarCarId}, #{reservInsurance}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from CAR_CATEGORY order by car_category_num
mapper.insert: insert into PAYINFO(pay_no, reserv_num, user_tel1, user_tel2, user_tel3, pay_method, pay_money, pay_condition, pay_regdate) values(#{payNo}, #{reservNum}, #{userTel1}, #{userTel2}, #{userTel3}, #{payMethod}, #{payMoney}, #{payCondition}, TO_DATE(#{payRegdate},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'))
